item.title: Euromonitor categorizes audiences into seven different consumer types
item.description:
Euromonitor’s Survey team has identified seven distinct global consumer types based on their Global Consumer Trends survey: the Undaunted Striver, Impulsive Spender, Balanced Optimist, Aspiring Struggler, Conservative Homebody, Independent Skeptic and Secure Traditionalist. Source: Euromonitor website. Each consumer type exhibits unique preferences and habits, even when sharing similar demographics. For instance, the relatively young Impulsive Spender views life as busy but exciting, characterized by a social, indulgent, and friend-oriented nature. Conversely, Independent Skeptics, also categorized as young consumers, define themselves by living life on their own terms, embracing unconventionality, skepticism, and indifference...
